verbs.description: [V: Appearing] [ARGM-LOC: on both CNN ’s New Day and MSNBC Live With Hallie Jackson] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] , [ARG0: White House Legislative Affairs Director Marc Short] called out the daily liberal media obsession with speculation over whether or not President Trump would attempt to fire Special Counsel Robert Mueller .
